channel.title: Make NPC's drop, realistic stuff...?
channel.description:
Anyone know how I can make my NPC's drop stuff like coins for men and ahrims stuff for ahrim and things? Cause so far even though in npc.cfg I done this, they still drop random stuff, like a guthix kite that I got from a man. Anyone know how to set it so they just drop the items you choose? Thankyou. Please post.
Mankk
